quoteText:
Our Service is not directed to persons under 13.
Ryver does not knowingly collect or solicit personal information from anyone under the age of 13 or knowingly allow such persons to register with the Service.
If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under age 13 without verification of parental consent, we will take steps to remove that information.
title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age
